org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow.internal

Class InventoryServiceShim

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow.internal.InventoryServiceShim
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageListener, ISwitchStateListener, IOFStatisticsListener, IContainerAware, IContainerListener

    public class InventoryServiceShim
extends java.lang.Object
implements IContainerListener, IMessageListener, ISwitchStateListener, IOFStatisticsListener, IContainerAware
    The class describes a shim layer that bridges inventory events from Openflow core to various listeners. The notifications are filtered based on container configurations.

      Notification raised when the container flow layout changes
      void containerModeUpdated(UpdateType t)
      Notification raised when the container mode has changed This notification is needed for some bundle in the default container to cleanup some HW state when switching from non-slicing to slicing case and vice-versa

      • receive

        public void receive(ISwitch sw,
           org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage msg)
        Description copied from interface: IMessageListener
        This method is called by the Controller when a message is received from a switch. Application who is interested in receiving OF Messages needs to implement this method.
        Specified by:
        receive in interface IMessageListener
        Parameters:
        sw - The ISwitch which sent the OF message
        msg - The OF message

      • switchAdded

        public void switchAdded(ISwitch sw)
        Description copied from interface: ISwitchStateListener
        This method is invoked by Controller when a switch has been connected to the Controller. Application who wants to receive this event needs to implement this method.
        Specified by:
        switchAdded in interface ISwitchStateListener
        Parameters:
        sw - The switch that has just connected.

      • switchDeleted

        public void switchDeleted(ISwitch sw)
        Description copied from interface: ISwitchStateListener
        This method is invoked by Controller when a switch has been disconnected from the Controller. Application who wants to receive this event needs to implement this method.
        Specified by:
        switchDeleted in interface ISwitchStateListener
        Parameters:

      • containerModeUpdated

        public void containerModeUpdated(UpdateType t)
        Description copied from interface: IContainerListener
        Notification raised when the container mode has changed This notification is needed for some bundle in the default container to cleanup some HW state when switching from non-slicing to slicing case and vice-versa
        Specified by:
        containerModeUpdated in interface IContainerListener
        Parameters:
        t - type of modification UpdateType. ADDED when first container is created, REMOVED when last container is removed

      • tagUpdated

        public void tagUpdated(java.lang.String containerName,
              Node n,
              short oldTag,
              short newTag,
              UpdateType t)
        Description copied from interface: IContainerListener
        Called to notify a change in the tag assigned to a switch
        Specified by:
        tagUpdated in interface IContainerListener
        Parameters:
        containerName - container for which the update has been raised
        n - Node of the tag under notification
        oldTag - previous version of the tag, this differ from the newTag only if the UpdateType is a modify
        newTag - new value for the tag, different from oldTag only in case of modify operation
        t - type of update

      • containerFlowUpdated

        public void containerFlowUpdated(java.lang.String containerName,
                        ContainerFlow previousFlow,
                        ContainerFlow currentFlow,
                        UpdateType t)
        Description copied from interface: IContainerListener
        Notification raised when the container flow layout changes
        Specified by:
        containerFlowUpdated in interface IContainerListener
        Parameters:
        containerName - container for which the update has been raised
        previousFlow - previous value of the container flow ContainerFlow under update, differs from the currentFlow only and only if it's an update operation
        currentFlow - current version of the container flow ContainerFlow differs from the previousFlow only in case of update
        t - type of update UpdateType

      • nodeConnectorUpdated

        public void nodeConnectorUpdated(java.lang.String containerName,
                        NodeConnector nc,
                        UpdateType t)
        Description copied from interface: IContainerListener
        Notification raised when a NodeConnector is added or removed in the container.
        Specified by:
        nodeConnectorUpdated in interface IContainerListener
        Parameters:
        containerName - container for which the update has been raised
        nc - NodeConnector NodeConnector being updated
        t - type of modification UpdateType, but among the types the modify operation is not expected to be raised because the nodeConnectors are anyway immutable so this is only used to add/delete
